thread.title: New York Giants' Daniel Fells Has Serious Staph Infection, May Lose Foot After 5 Surgeries
thread.title_full: New York Giants' Daniel Fells Has Serious Staph Infection, May Lose Foot After 5 Surgeries - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: New York Giants' Daniel Fells Has Serious Staph Infection, May Lose Foot After 5 Surgeries
text: New York Giants starting tight end Daniel Fells contracted a dangerous staph infection and may have to have his foot amputated, the NFL reports. The 32-year-old football star was complaining on ankle and foot pain for days, and was finally taken to a hospital when he developed a high fever on October 2. It was [...] Â»
